title: DungeonGPT.js
description: An AI-powered dungeon master for tabletop RPG adventures. Uses GPT to generate dynamic storylines, NPCs, and encounters in real-time.

title: RPG Loom
description: A deterministic incremental RPG with AI-powered dynamic content generation. Features quest systems, crafting, combat, and multi-provider LLM support for narrative generation.

title: NovelWriter
description: A distraction-free writing application designed for novelists and long-form content creators. Features chapter organization, word count tracking, and export options.

title: Nebula Rush (Sci-Fi Game)
description: A high-speed sci-fi racing game built with React, Three.js, and Tailwind CSS. Inspired by F-Zero.

title: Fantasy Card Game
description: A digital collectible card game with fantasy themes. Features deck building, strategic gameplay, and beautiful card artwork.

title: StoryDaemon
description: StoryDaemon generates long-form fiction through an autonomous agent that plans, writes, and evolves stories organically.

title: PSI Demo
description: A demonstration of Private Set Intersection (PSI) cryptographic protocols. Allows two parties to compute the intersection of their datasets without revealing the full datasets.

title: Roguelike Dungeon Crawler
description: A classic roguelike dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels, turn-based combat, and permadeath. Built with modern web technologies.

title: VRF Loot Generator
description: A demonstration of Verifiable Random Functions (VRFs) for cryptographically secure loot generation. Features an online trading system with commit-reveal protocol to prevent tampering.

title: LiveSlides
description: An AI-native presentation tool for creating media-rich slides. Write presentations in MDX with React components, featuring 10 smooth transitions, presenter view, and camera overlay support.

title: NoBS Recorder
description: A minimal, reliable desktop screen recorder for Linux (X11). Features window/screen capture, microphone support with volume boost, webcam overlay, and auto-save functionality.
